item.title: Adult
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:48, topic:264413”][quote author=srt8 link=topic=349165.msg2690950#msg2690950 date=1235954812]
There is no way to enforce the rules so it just can’t happen
[/quote]
She has a vagina, so we should listen to her.

On a serious note, the last thing this place needs is to start “endorcing” the use of drugs.[/quote]

It’s not endorsing drugs. Like I said earlier the board description could clearly state we don’t condone the use of drugs. It’s a section that would be created because of popular demand. A place to practice harm reduction and whatnot. In the past little while I have seen a ton of different drug threads. 10 actually but most are dying now.

But it doesn’t matter the answer was no to this.

Read full topic

item.title: Adult
item.dc:creator: @pesky pesky
item.description:
@pesky wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:45, topic:264413”][quote author=jme link=topic=349165.msg2688809#msg2688809 date=1235846015]

No to the 18+ section. That is simply immature, and would only attract horny 13 year olds.

As for the drug section, that is a good idea I believe.

I don’t think a drug forum is ever going to happen. Moparisthebest doesn’t want to encourage drug use to kids, I suppose.

I think it would be a fun section but maybe still not a good idea. Although there could be a disclaimer on the board description like “mitb.com does not condone nor encourage the use of illegal drugs. This section was created due to popular demand”

I don’t want to push for it though. Not my descision and it’s probably better if this section doesn’t exist.
[/quote]
Drugs section can be a good idea, but only by people that want into it must read a disclaimer about the danger of using drugs, and its not allowed to get someone start using drugs or claiming that something danger is harmless.
Or disallow all illegal drugs on MITB.[/quote]

How will you make people read it though, everyone will just scroll to the bottom lol

Read full topic

I think it would be a fun section but maybe still not a good idea. Although there could be a disclaimer on the board description like “mitb.com does not condone nor encourage the use of illegal drugs. This section was created due to popular demand”

I don’t want to push for it though. Not my descision and it’s probably better if this section doesn’t exist.[/quote]
Drugs section can be a good idea, but only by people that want into it must read a disclaimer about the danger of using drugs, and its not allowed to get someone start using drugs or claiming that something danger is harmless.
Or disallow all illegal drugs on MITB.

As for the drug section, that is a good idea I believe.

Example: Marijane = Tylenol

I took 4.2 teaspoons of tylenol today[/quote]Pop 13 advil and that’ll be your last damn headache.
